community_feed.please_note_desc: The responder may not have relevant expertise or medical/other license in your region or at all. The service is provided for general information and educational knowledge and does not provide or constitute as professional or medical advice in any way, therefore must not be relied upon as much. Make all medical and health-related decisions based on professionals outside of the service, who are fully aware of your medical, individual needs and circumstances. For more information and full disclaimer visit our
